backend/main.mo: Motoko actor managing categories, writings, and user profiles with admin/user authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing branding update features, affected files, components, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-style map summarizing all major frontend files and their roles in routing, UI, and admin features.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining custom OKLCH color variables and theme settings for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML document setting the root mount point and site title "Meri KITAAB".
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React router configuration defining public and admin routes wrapped in site and admin layouts.
frontend/src/components/admin/WritingPre: Admin preview card rendering writing title, warnings, and formatted content using prose styles.
frontend/src/components/auth/AccessDenie: UI screen showing authentication or admin-access errors with login and return-home actions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AdminRouteG: Route guard that checks Internet Identity authentication and admin permissions before rendering children.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Auth button handling Internet Identity login/logout with query cache clearing on sign-out.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Modal that collects a user's name and saves the profile using a mutation with basic validation and toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/layout/AdminLayo: Admin dashboard layout providing navigation to categories and writings along with a back-to-site button.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteLayou: Main site layout with header, navigation, authentication/UI hooks, optional admin link, and footer.
frontend/src/components/state/ErrorState: Displays a styled error message with optional retry button and friendly error text mapping.
frontend/src/components/state/LoadingSta: Shows a loading message and a configurable number of skeleton placeholders.
frontend/src/hooks/queryKeys.ts: Defines reusable React Query keys for categories, writings, profiles, and admin checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages the backend actor based on identity, refetching dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity authentication context, handling login, stored identities, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks for public, admin, and mutation operations interacting with the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind-based global styles defining light/dark color palettes and typography enhancements.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point initializing React, QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and global styles.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategories: Admin interface for listing, editing, and deleting categories with status badges and confirmation dialogs. Supports navigation and error/loading handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminCategoryEd: Form for creating or editing a category with fields for title, status, and banner URL. Saves changes via API hooks and handles validation and loading states.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminDashboardP: Admin dashboard showing counts of categories and writings with quick navigation to management pages. Provides shortcuts to create new items.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWritingEdi: Provides a form-based editor to create or update writings with title, content, category, and warnings, including preview and save logic. Integrates API mutations and navigation with loading and validation handling.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminWritingsPa: Lists all writings with options to create, edit, publish, unpublish, and delete. Handles loading/error states and user actions with confirmation dialogs and API mutations.
frontend/src/pages/CategoryPage.tsx: Displays a specific category and its published writings, handling loading, errors, and navigation to writing details. Filters writings by category and updates the page title.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Shows the homepage with a hero section, public categories, and recent writings. Handles loading and error states for category data.
frontend/src/pages/WritingDetailPage.tsx: Renders a full writing with category info, content warnings, and navigation back to category or home. Handles loading, errors, and dynamic page titles.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL or hash. Supports both query-string and hash-based routing.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugins like typography and container queries.
project_state.json: Metadata file describing project state, features, pending requests, and high-level project info for Meri KITAAB.
